wikipedia_page.main: Nick Ward is a Welsh singer-songwriter from Porthcawl, South Wales. He signed to UK label AudioFile Records in 2009 and has many releases to his name, Outside Looking In (2009), Pink Bay (2010), Cadenza (2012), World in Reverse (2014) and Phonus Balonus (2017).

response: *Nick Ward, in original lineup of Australian band The Church
